title: Strategies for Reducing Student Dropout in Online Science Education: Data-Driven Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Methodology acquisition for reducing student attrition through effective instructional design in blended learning environments for science education, targeting pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more student dropout prediction indicators in online science education courses
Learners can propose two or more instructional design improvements based on data mining results
Learners can design and apply three or more activities that enhance social and cognitive presence
Learners can develop two solutions to address the lack of discussion facilitation and cognitive integration strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
